mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mate( mateCreateTime, mateUpdateTime, mateCampsite, mateCamptype, mateCampstart, mateCampend, lowestAge, highestAge mateTitle, mateContent, mateAccompanyNum, mateNum ) VALUES( now(), now(), #{mateCampsite},#{mateCamptype},#{mateCampstart}, #{mateCampend},#{lowestAge},#{highestAge}, #{mateTitle},#{mateContent},#{mateAccompanyNum},#{mateNum})
INSERT INTO mateCampStyle ( mateNo, mCampStyle1, mCampStyle2, mCampStyle3 ) VALUES ( #{ mateNo }, #{mCampStyle1}, #{mCampStyle2}, #{mCampStyle3} )

INSERT INTO mateCampEquipRequire ( mateNo, mRequire1, mRequire2, mRequire3, mRequire4, mRequire5, mRequire6, mRequire7, mRequire8, mRequire9, mRequire10) VALUES ( #{ mateNo }, #{mRequire1}, #{mRequire2}, #{mRequire3}, #{mRequire4}, #{mRequire5}, #{mRequire6}, #{mRequire7}, #{mRequire8}, #{mRequire9}, #{mRequire10})
mapper.select: select m.mateNo, m.mateCreateTime, m.mateUpdateTime, m.mateImageUrl, m.mateCampsite, m.mateCampstyle, m.mateCamptype, m.mateCampstart, m.mateCampend, m.contentId, m.mateStatus, m.userNo, m.lowestAge, m.mateContent, m.highestAge, m.mateTitle, u.userNickname from mate m, user u where m.userNo = u.userNo order by m.mateNo desc;

SELECT m.mateNo, m.mateCreateTime, m.mateUpdateTime, m.mateImageUrl, m.mateCampsite, m.mateCampstart, m.mateCampend, m.userNo, m.lowestAge, m.highestAge, m.mateTitle, m.mateContent, m.mateAccompanyNum, m.mateNum, u.userProfileImage, u.userNickName FROM mate m, user u WHERE m.userNo = u.userNo AND mateNo = #{mateNo}
SELECT brazier, burner, chair, icebox, lantern, powerstrip, sleepingbag, table, tarp, tent FROM mateCampEquipRequire WHERE mateNo = #{mateNo}
